function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Challenges related to employment and income of millions of people","Impact":"Increased economic instability, poverty, and social unrest","Mitigation":"Implement support schemes, job creation, and income support programs","Technologies":"Online work platforms, digital payment systems","People":"Informal sector workers, unemployed individuals","Owner":"Governments, organizations, employers"},{"Description":"Fear and anxiety due to economic shocks and recession","Impact":"Mental health issues, stress, and anxiety-related health problems","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support, financial assistance programs","Technologies":"Telemedicine, online counseling services","People":"General population, individuals affected by economic instability","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health organizations, governments"},{"Description":"Impact of travel constraints and quarantine measures","Impact":"Disruption of trade, economic activity, and social interactions","Mitigation":"Efficient testing and tracing systems, targeted quarantine measures","Technologies":"Rapid testing kits, contact tracing apps","People":"Travelers, businesses, individuals in quarantine","Owner":"Health authorities, governments, travel industry"}]}
